GLM_GTX_integer
[GTX Extensions (Experimental)]

GLM_FUNC_DECL uint glm::nlz (uint x)

Detailed Description

Add support for integer for core functions.

<glm/gtx/integer.hpp> need to be included to use these functionalities.

Typedef Documentation

typedef signed int glm::sint

32bit signed integer. From GLM_GTX_integer extension.

Definition at line 81 of file integer.hpp.

00175                 y = -int(x >> 16);      // If left half of x is 0,
00176                 m = (y >> 16) & 16;  // set n = 16.  If left half

00178                 x = x >> m;          // shift x right 16.
00179                                                         // Now x is of the form 0000xxxx.
00180                 y = x - 0x100;       // If positions 8-15 are 0,

00194

00196                 m = y & ~(y >> 1);   // Set m = 0, 1, 2, or 2 resp.
00197                 return unsigned(n + 2 - m);
